definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: It made clear that temperature is an important influence factor for flesh color and senescence of fruits under storage.
sentences.chinese: 这表明温度对采后梅果果肉色泽及衰老有很大的影响。

sentences.english: The watery fluid in the central cavity of the coconut, used chiefly as a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 从椰子果肉中提取的奶状液体，用于食物或作为饮料。

sentences.english: The pulp of fruit is edible and tastes sweet and acidic.
sentences.chinese: 果瓣跟剥开的蒜瓣相似，果肉可食，味道酸甜。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the inheritance of the stone cells in the pear flesh of the progeny hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了梨的杂种后代果肉中石细胞的遗传。

sentences.english: The fruit has dark green pulp which has a delicious flavour like cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 刺角瓜的果肉深绿色，味道鲜美如黄瓜。

sentences.english: Sugarcane borers turn the white pulp of the cane to a reddish tinge.
sentences.chinese: 被蔗螟啃过的甘蔗，果肉由白转红。

sentences.english: These jujubes with watery flesh are a specialty of my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 这是我家乡特产的肉枣，果肉柔软。

sentences.english: With thin peel and sweet pulp, they are small, fire red, crystal clear, and seedless.
sentences.chinese: 个小色红，晶莹光亮，皮薄无核，果肉蜜甜。

sentences.english: It nips a hole first, then eats as far as possible the inside fruit pulp.
sentences.chinese: 它先咬一个洞，然后把里面的果肉尽可能吃掉。

sentences.english: Flesh hypertrophy, the larger fruit weight of more than 200 grams, less the number of results.
sentences.chinese: 果肉肥厚，大者单果重达200克以上，结果数较少。

sentences.english: To make apple sauce, you have to remove the skins from the apples and use only the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 要做苹果酱，你必须削去苹果皮，只用果肉。

sentences.english: Very sweet and juicy , firm flesh with few seeds.
sentences.chinese: 很甜美多汁，果肉公司与数种子。

sentences.english: You can also treat yourself to yellow-and orange-fleshed varieties .
sentences.chinese: 你也可以享受黄色和橙色果肉的不同种类。

sentences.english: The Honey Mustard Fruits can be served cold or warm.
sentences.chinese: 芥末果肉蜂蜜即可冷食也可热食。

sentences.english: Pumpkins have firm flesh, seeds in the center and a shell that is usually orange.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜有很坚实的果肉，子在中间，通常是桔色的。

sentences.english: The marketable fruit rate of grape has a good linear relationship with fruit hardness.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄好果率与果肉硬度在一定范围内呈良好线性关系。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
